description:
The Microsoft Band SDK gives developers access to the sensors available on Microsoft Band 1 and Microsoft Band 2, as well as the ability to create tiles.
      Enhance and extend the experience of your applications to your customers' wrists. More at http://developer.microsoftband.com/.
releaseNotes:
The Band SDK works with both Microsoft Band 1 and Microsoft Band 2.
      For Microsoft Band 2, the SDK introduces new sensors (Barometer, Altimeter, GSR, RR Interval, Ambient Light),
      it increases the icon limits for tiles, and allows creation of PDF 417 barcodes with alpha/numeric data.
summary:

title: Microsoft Band SDK
